product_name: Gramicci Scout Long-Sleeve Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With an old-school railroad stripe and a soft cotton fabric, the Gramicci Scout Long-Sleeve Shirt keeps you looking classy while emphasizing comfort for your casual adventures. Cotton is naturally soft, breathable and comfortable. Reinforced chest pockets with button flaps. Gramicci Scout Long-Sleeve Shirt has a classic fit that's roomy through the chest, armholes and waist. Closeout.
short_description: With an old-school railroad stripe and a soft cotton fabric, the Gramicci Scout Long-Sleeve Shirt keeps you looking classy while emphasizing comfort for your casual adventures.
